::Nighlight::


"I did " said Nighlight "I'll go to find out... Virgo could you come 
with me? Land mine stay here and take care of perplex.."

Nighlight used her come link and said "Gramps, you should take Zeni 
and Trinity and left the control room come to maps, I'l send you 
where's."She showed them where is it by her comm link " Termitron, go 
with them..."

"We'll right back" she said and started walk
